text: Benjamin de Rothschild (30 July 1963 – 15 January 2021) was a French banker. He is the owner of the Edmond de Rothschild Group from 1997 until his death. He was the son of Edmond Adolphe (1926–1997) and Nadine (born 1932). In 1972, he created the professional offshore sailing racing team Gitana Team. On 15 January 2021 De Rothschild suffered a heart attack and died, at his home in Pregny-Chambésy, Switzerland. He was 57. ==References== Category:1963 births Category:2021 deaths Category:Deaths from myocardial infarction Category:French bankers Category:Rothschild family Category:European Jews
title: Benjamin de Rothschild
